tr.td: <title>Configuring a Separate iSCSI Network to use with VSA</title>
<para>This page describes the procedure to assign a separate iSCSI network to use with VSA nodes.
You must configure controller and compute nodes along with VSA to use a separate iSCSI
<para>Perform the following procedure to assign a separate iSCSI network:</para>
assign a separate iSCSI network to controller nodes, compute nodes, and VSA nodes:</para>
<para>The input YAML files need to be changed during the cloud deployment.</para>
<para><literal>networks.yml</literal>: Enter the name of the network-group as shown in the
example below. In the following example, the name of the network-group is "ISCSI" and
this name should remain consistent in other files too.</para>
in this file, as shown in the sample below.</para>
#Define the Global networks shared across all the Racks
<para>Run the following command to create a deployment directory.</para>
<para>Run the <literal>site.yml</literal> playbook using the command below. </para>
